summary: Is an audio replacer for all Bard Songs.
descriptionHtml:
[heading]
[b]
Why Overhall ??
[/b]
[/heading]
The Bards College of Solitude is an esteemed institute of learning Art and Music, in whole of Tamriel.
So the so called scholars of Bards College are supposed to show some understanding of Music, Rhythm. Its one thing to create a nice environment around by singing the old Nords tales and prophecies, while its completely different thing to read out those stories.

Bards are meant to be singers and not readers.This MOD adds different Skyrim Covers done by Malukah, Edoardo, ScheherazadEify and Sabrina, to the Bards quiver. Now no more unpleasant pauses, offtones, break of rhythm, only immersive Bardic Performance that will make you to Dwnld FNIS and clap at the end.
[b]
[heading]
Bard Songs Overhall v2.1
[/heading]
[/b]
Version 2.1 adds more covers for each song for a better immersive experience.
Includes cover from Malukah, Edoardo Morelli, Sabrina Valenzuela and ScheherazadEify for all Skyrim songs.
Updated and removed all the errors from version 2.0. Now compatible with every MOD that adds any custom Bard to Skyrim.
Hopefully it will be the Final version for this MOD.

Lip synching now is much much better though not accurate at times (we all know it's not meant for that).
For more accurate LIP SYNCH try my other Mod BardSongsBetter
available at http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54293/?

[color=red]
The covers used are as follows -
Age of Aggression : Malukah & Edoardo Morelli
Age of Oppression : Malukah, Edoardo and Sabarina(male)
Ragnar the Red : Edoardo Morelli & Sabrina Valenzuela
Dragonborn Comes : Malukah, Edoardo, Sabarina
Tale of Tongues : Malukah, Edoardo, ScheherazadEify
[/color]
[b]
You can always listen to their Original covers on YouTube, some of my favourites are given below:
[/b]
1) ScheherazadEify- Tale Of Tongues
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Dj-MDRkh4x0

2)Sabarina-Ragnar the Red
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6rZQvbiiOOI

3)Edoardo-Age of Aggression
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=k0_LChL94bE

4) Malukah-Dragonborn Comes
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4z9TdDCWN7g

[b]
Installation:
[/b]
Use NMM for easy installation.
For Manual just drop the files in Data folder.
[b]
Uninstallation:
[/b]
Use NMM for easy uninstallation.

[b]
Big Thanks To:
[/b]
Malukah, Edoardo Morelli, Sabrina Valenzuela and ScheherazadEify for letting me mess around with their covers.
Bethesda for making Skyrim and creation Kit.
Bethesda again for making the bards as they are in vanilla game otherwise this MOD wouldn't exist.

[b]
and if you want to play your own songs Check out my other Mod MyBardSongs at
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54604/?
Enjoy...!!
:)
[/b]
author: rex007king
